external_games.name: Hare In The Hat: The Abyss

name: Hare In The Hat: The Abyss
summary: Hare In The Hat: The Abyss, a DLC for Hare In The Hat, is a fancy point & click cartoon adventure game with puzzles and mini-games of varying difficulty. It takes place in sea abyss, filled with puzzles, riddles, clues and hidden objects. Don't let the Hare disappear in the abyss!
